name: G!RO
description:
G!RO is an arcade-hypercasual mix where you are in control of a rotating spaceship. G!RO currently features different biomes, player controlled spaceships. There will also be an experience-based progression system, unlockables, personalization and much more!

We aim mainly for the mobile market.

Controls:

Mouse - You can play the entire game using only your mouse.

Keyboard - You can also use the "Arrow Keys" to move through the menus. Use "DEL" and "END" to confirm and exit respectively.
